mapper.select: SELECT s.sns_type_id sns_type, s.sns_cn, s.sns_en, s.sns_jp, s.default_url, s.icon FROM tb_sns_type s ORDER BY s.inx
select c.company_id, company_name, company_alias, company_region from mug_company c order by c.company_name

select game_id, common_name, other_name, icon_version, developer, c.company_name from mug_game g left join mug_company c on g.developer = c.company_id where instr(g.common_name, #{search}) > 0 or instr(g.other_name, #{search}) > 0 or instr(c.company_name, #{search}) > 0 order by common_name

select single_id, single_title_en, single_title_jp, single_title_cn, single_alias, single_artist from mug_single s where instr(single_title_en, #{search}) > 0 or instr(single_title_jp, #{search}) > 0 or instr(single_title_cn, #{search}) > 0 or instr(single_alias, #{search}) > 0 order by single_title_en limit 50
select person_id, person_name, person_alias, person_region from mug_person p where instr(person_name, #{search}) > 0 or instr(person_alias, #{search}) > 0 order by person_name limit 50
select uid, id, face from mug_uploader where instr(id, #{search}) > 0 or uid = #{search} order by id limit 50

select v.aid, v.bid, v.title, v.pub_time, v.copyright, v.uid, v.play, v.cover, v.update_time, u.id, u.face from mug_video v left join mug_uploader u on v.uid = u.uid where aid = #{search} or bid = #{search} or bid = concat('BV', #{search}) or instr(title, #{search}) > 0 or instr(id, #{search}) > 0 or v.uid = #{search} order by v.play desc limit 50
